#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	long long int p,i;
	
	
	
	for(p=0;p<t;p++)
	{   
	   char name[10];
	   scanf("%s",name);
	   char str[1000];
	   scanf("%s",str);
	   
	   int flag=0;
	   int a[26];
	   for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	    a[i]=0;
	    
	   for(i=0;i<strlen(str);i++)
	   {   int k = str[i]-97;
	       a[k]++;
	   }
	   int count=0;
	   for(i=0;i<26;i++)
	   {
	   	count = count^a[i];	
	   }	   
		

		if(count==0)
		{
			if(name[0]=='T')
				cout<<"Varun"<<endl;
			else
				cout<<"Tarun"<<endl;
		}
		else{
			if(name[0]=='T')
				cout<<"Tarun"<<endl;
			else
				cout<<"Varun"<<endl;

		}

	}


 
	
	
	
	return 0;
}
